name: SugarStellar
description:
Alice bakes the best cupcakes around, but can she steer through the dangers of the outer space sweets business?

SugarStellar is inspired by old vector arcade games. 

Screenshots

SugarStellar was created in 2016 (not 1981) by David / Oth / Anna / music by Scott Smigiel.

If you experience poor performance in the browser version, you can download the game below.

Credits: font, sounds (incoming message, alarm, freighter problem, thrust, explosion), and cabinet photo (some of these we edited).
